name: Kurmancî A1
description: Beginner Kurmanji Kurdish — from first greetings to basic conversation.

modules.name: A1: Destpêk
modules.description: Foundation module covering greetings, basic vocabulary, pronouns, verbs, and simple sentences.

units.name: Silav û Reng
units.description: Learn basic greetings, introductions, farewells, and colors in Kurmanji Kurdish.

units.name: Ev Çi Ye?
units.description: Learn to identify everyday objects, ask 'What is this?', and build basic noun vocabulary.

units.name: Cînav û Bûn
units.description: Master Kurdish personal pronouns and the verb 'bûn' (to be) in present tense.

units.name: Danasîn û Hevok
units.description: Describe people and things using adjectives, and form simple Kurdish sentences.

units.name: Kesandina Lêkeran
units.description: Learn how Kurdish verbs change based on the subject — present tense conjugation patterns.

units.name: Lêker û Hevok
units.description: Combine verbs with nouns and adjectives to form complete everyday sentences.

units.name: Têgihîştin û Axaftin
units.description: Practice listening comprehension and spoken Kurdish through dialogues and exercises.

units.name: Peyvên Pirsê û Malbat
units.description: Learn question words (who, what, where, when, why) and family vocabulary.
